pajk.game.main.java.model.terrain

Interface Terrain

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Forest, Mountain, Plains, River

    public interface Terrain
    Represents a type of terrain with its specific parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getEvasion()
      Determine the evasion bonus/penalty given to units on this tile in combat.
      int getMovementCost(Unit.MovementType movType)
      Determine the movement cost of the tile based on the type of unit crossing it.
      java.lang.String getType() 

    • Method Detail

      • getMovementCost

        int getMovementCost(Unit.MovementType movType)
        Determine the movement cost of the tile based on the type of unit crossing it.
        Parameters:
        movType - The movement type of the unit.
        Returns:
        The movement cost of this terrain type.

      • getEvasion

        int getEvasion()
        Determine the evasion bonus/penalty given to units on this tile in combat.
        Returns:
        The added/decreased evasion as a percentage value. Bonuses are positive, penalties are negative.

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        Returns:
        The terrain type's name.
